typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesOrderLines
SalesOrderLines derive(IsActive = 1) ~> AddingIsActive1
AddingIsActive1 keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
SurrogateKey2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,0),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,0),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		SurrogateKey as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
